file_content.text: They're sending a cleanup crew to make sure no rakghouls slipped by, just in case.
I just heard from Doctor Zalaren. Between the panic room and your help, I think almost everyone got out okay.
Thanks again. And don't worry, we're building power surge defenses in right this minute.
The security systems should be a big help if you can get them online.
Master Jedi! Please, wait--nobody's responding, something's gone wrong!
Sir! Please, sir, I can't raise anyone on the communicator--everything's gone wrong!
Wait! You're that freighter captain, aren't you? Everyone says you're tough--please, you've got to help me.
Wait! Please, they've all gone silent! There's no time for me to call for help!
We've lost contact with Project Quell, in the lower ground labs. It's, um, supposed to study those rakghoul creatures.
They kept a whole pack of them there. The scientists wanted to study the rakghouls' behavior, try to find weaknesses we could use.
Someone approved this?
Doctor Zalaren was project lead. But he only took the job after checking all the security himself!
You can't fight an opponent you don't understand.
I see. Knowing the enemy.
But what's to understand, Master Jedi? They're rakghouls. You shoot them.
Give me numbers, Private. How big is this rakghoul pack?
Rakghouls? How many?
I never saw them, sir, only those huge crates of food they brought in.
Sounds like an Imperial lab.
Wait, what? No! Project Quell was just to watch the rakghouls, not do anything to them!
And something went wrong?
That was incredibly stupid.
I kept saying it was a bad idea! But I'm just a private, who cares what I think.
All I know is, nobody's answering my check-ins. There was a power surge not long ago... maybe that opened the rakghoul pens.
None of our scientists have come out. But if they reached the lab's panic room, they might still be alive. Please, you have to find them!
Don't worry, I will.
Leave this to me, Private.
Here--this code will arm Project Quell's security systems. If anyone's in the panic room, the defense droids will protect them.
Just don't let your guard down. I don't know just what you'll find down there. Good luck.
Why don't you? [Refuse quest]
Me? But I won't last five minutes down--where are you going?
Looks like we just had a power surge. Better call it in.
